'''Dredging the Land''' is a World Quest that is part of the [[Crimson Wish]] event in [[Dragonspine]], [[Mondstadt]].

==Steps==
{{Quest Description| The materials that the [[Hilichurl|hilichurls]] have piled up here have, by pure chance, blocked the flow of the [[Ley Lines|ley lines]]. If you can destroy these [[Frostburst Barrel|Frostburst Barrels]] in a short period, you might be able to dredge up the land and obtain more precious [[Crimson Agate|Crimson Agates]].}}
;Version 1
#Complete [[Time Trial Challenge]]
